scripts.build: cd system/ && cargo build-sbf && cd ..  && cd  account-compression/ && cargo build-sbf --features 'test, migrate-state' && cd .. && cd  registry/ && cargo build-sbf && cd .. && cd compressed-token/program && cargo build-sbf && cd ../../..
scripts.build-compressed-token-small: cd compressed-token && cargo build-sbf --features cpi-without-program-ids && cd ..
scripts.test: RUSTFLAGS="-D warnings" && pnpm test-account-compression &&  pnpm test-compressed-token && pnpm e2e-test && pnpm test-registry && pnpm sdk-test-program && pnpm test-system && pnpm test-system-cpi
